data.message: I just screen captured someones picture they got already to save me the effort of doing it myself and mainly for the fact I could take a sniper rifle with me and save a lot of people to endure someone who should have just left it in the early 2000 and never thought about becoming an actor, I think this one is better then the depressing story and I promise a guy who doesn't sing cry me a river in a annoying high pitched voice will be harmed.
